discipline.ja: ものづくり技術（機械・電気電子・化学工学）

paper_title.ja: Co-Cr-Cグラニュラー薄膜の磁気特性に及ぼす下地層効果(共著)
paper_title.en: Effects of an Underlayer on the Magnetic Properties of Co-Cr-C Granular Films

description.ja: We investigated the magnetic properties of Co-Cr-C/SiO<sub>2</sub> bilayer film, and of Co-Cr-C/Ag/SiO<sub>2</sub>, Co-Cr-C/Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub>, and Co-Cr-C/Ag/Ti/Si0<sub>2</sub> multilayer films. It was found that a granular Co-Cr-C film annealed at 550°C after deposition on a (10 Å) Ag/(1000Å) Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub> underlayer showed a larger Hc<sub>⊥</sub>/Hc<sub>//</sub> ratio (the ratio of the perpendicular coercivity Hc<sub>⊥</sub> to the in-plane coercivity Hc<sub>//</sub>) than films deposited on (10 Å)Ag/SiO<sub>2</sub> or (1000 Å)Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub> underlayers. This result is considered to be attributable to the fact that the (10 Å)Ag/(1000 Å)Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub> underlayer promotes the orientation of the c axis of hcp-Co grains and increases the perpendicular coercivity of the film.
description.en: We investigated the magnetic properties of Co-Cr-C/SiO<sub>2</sub> bilayer film, and of Co-Cr-C/Ag/SiO<sub>2</sub>, Co-Cr-C/Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub>, and Co-Cr-C/Ag/Ti/Si0<sub>2</sub> multilayer films. It was found that a granular Co-Cr-C film annealed at 550°C after deposition on a (10 Å) Ag/(1000Å) Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub> underlayer showed a larger Hc<sub>⊥</sub>/Hc<sub>//</sub> ratio (the ratio of the perpendicular coercivity Hc<sub>⊥</sub> to the in-plane coercivity Hc<sub>//</sub>) than films deposited on (10 Å)Ag/SiO<sub>2</sub> or (1000 Å)Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub> underlayers. This result is considered to be attributable to the fact that the (10 Å)Ag/(1000 Å)Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub> underlayer promotes the orientation of the c axis of hcp-Co grains and increases the perpendicular coercivity of the film.

publication_name.en: Journal of the Magnetics Society of Japan

paper_title.ja: Co-Cr-Cグラニュラー薄膜の磁気特性に及ぼす下地層効果

description.ja: We investigated the magnetic properties of Co-Cr-C/SiO<sub>2</sub> bilayer film, and of Co-Cr-C/Ag/SiO<sub>2</sub>, Co-Cr-C/Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub>, and Co-Cr-C/Ag/Ti/Si0<sub>2</sub> multilayer films. It was found that a granular Co-Cr-C film annealed at 550°C after deposition on a (10 Å) Ag/(1000Å) Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub> underlayer showed a larger Hc<sub>⊥</sub>/Hc<sub>//</sub> ratio (the ratio of the perpendicular coercivity Hc<sub>⊥</sub> to the in-plane coercivity Hc<sub>//</sub>) than films deposited on (10 Å)Ag/SiO<sub>2</sub> or (1000 Å)Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub> underlayers. This result is considered to be attributable to the fact that the (10 Å)Ag/(1000 Å)Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub> underlayer promotes the orientation of the c axis of hcp-Co grains and increases the perpendicular coercivity of the film.
description.en: We investigated the magnetic properties of Co-Cr-C/SiO<sub>2</sub> bilayer film, and of Co-Cr-C/Ag/SiO<sub>2</sub>, Co-Cr-C/Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub>, and Co-Cr-C/Ag/Ti/Si0<sub>2</sub> multilayer films. It was found that a granular Co-Cr-C film annealed at 550°C after deposition on a (10 Å) Ag/(1000Å) Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub> underlayer showed a larger Hc<sub>⊥</sub>/Hc<sub>//</sub> ratio (the ratio of the perpendicular coercivity Hc<sub>⊥</sub> to the in-plane coercivity Hc<sub>//</sub>) than films deposited on (10 Å)Ag/SiO<sub>2</sub> or (1000 Å)Ti/SiO<sub>2</sub> underlayers. publication_name.en: Journal of the Magnetics Society of Japan

paper_title.ja: イオンビームスパッタ法によるCo-Cr/Ag/Cr/Glass膜の磁気特性
paper_title.en: Magnetic Properties of Co-Cr/Ag/Cr/Glass Films Made by the Ion Beam Sputtering Method

description.ja: The magnetic and microstructural properties of Co-Cr/ Ag/Cr/Glass films were studied changing the Ag interlayer thickness from 0 to 10Å. Changes in the magnetic and microstructural properties of films by annealing were found to depend not only on the annealing temperature, but also on the interlayer thickness. After annealing at 450°C, the perpendicular coercivity Hc(⊥) and perpendicular magnetic anisotropy field Hk(⊥) increased to about 1.7 kOe and 3.5 kOe, respectively, for Ag interlayer thicknesses of more than 2Å. With the presence of an Ag interlayer, the measured I(00.2)/I(10.1) of hcp-CO became larger, and c-axis perpendicular orientation was enhanced.
description.en: The magnetic and microstructural properties of Co-Cr/ Ag/Cr/Glass films were studied changing the Ag interlayer thickness from 0 to 10Å. Changes in the magnetic and microstructural properties of films by annealing were found to depend not only on the annealing temperature, but also on the interlayer thickness. After annealing at 450°C, the perpendicular coercivity Hc(⊥) and perpendicular magnetic anisotropy field Hk(⊥) increased to about 1.7 kOe and 3.5 kOe, respectively, for Ag interlayer thicknesses of more than 2Å. With the presence of an Ag interlayer, the measured I(00.2)/I(10.1) of hcp-CO became larger, and c-axis perpendicular orientation was enhanced.

publication_name.en: Journal of the Magnetics Society of Japan

description.ja: The magnetic and microstructural properties of Co-Cr/ Ag/Cr/Glass films were studied changing the Ag interlayer thickness from 0 to 10Å. Changes in the magnetic and microstructural properties of films by annealing were found to depend not only on the annealing temperature, but also on the interlayer thickness. After annealing at 450°C, the perpendicular coercivity Hc(⊥) and perpendicular magnetic anisotropy field Hk(⊥) increased to about 1.7 kOe and 3.5 kOe, respectively, for Ag interlayer thicknesses of more than 2Å. With the presence of an Ag interlayer, the measured I(00.2)/I(10.1) of hcp-CO became larger, and c-axis perpendicular orientation was enhanced.
description.en: The magnetic and microstructural properties of Co-Cr/ Ag/Cr/Glass films were studied changing the Ag interlayer thickness from 0 to 10Å. Changes in the magnetic and microstructural properties of films by annealing were found to depend not only on the annealing temperature, but also on the interlayer thickness. After annealing at 450°C, the perpendicular coercivity Hc(⊥) and perpendicular magnetic anisotropy field Hk(⊥) increased to about 1.7 kOe and 3.5 kOe, respectively, for Ag interlayer thicknesses of more than 2Å. With the presence of an Ag interlayer, the measured I(00.2)/I(10.1) of hcp-CO became larger, and c-axis perpendicular orientation was enhanced.

paper_title.ja: 偏光反射異方性を用いた磁気記録媒体粒子配向性の評価(共著)
paper_title.en: Evaluation of the Orientation of Particles in Magnetic Recording Media Using Polarized Light Reflection.

description.ja: The orientation of acicular Fe particles in magnetic coating media was investigated by the use of a polarized light reflection technique. The particle volume fraction, φP, of the magnetic coatings was changed from 30.5 to 53.7 vol%. The reflection ratio was compared with the squareness of the hysteresis for the coatings, measured by VSM, indicating the maximum value when plotted as a function of φP. The reflection intensity was strongly influenced by the surface roughness of the magnetic coatings. At a value of φP=45.1 vol%, the particles were well dispersed in the media, with the result that the coating surface became very smooth. The orientation of particles in a magnetic paint was also expressed as a function of the angle between the electric vector of the polarized light and the direction of the applied magnetic field. However, the reflection ratio as a function of another volume fraction, φPL, of the magnetic paints decreased with an increase in the apparent viscosity of the magnetic dispersion.
description.en: The orientation of acicular Fe particles in magnetic coating media was investigated by the use of a polarized light reflection technique. The particle volume fraction, φP, of the magnetic coatings was changed from 30.5 to 53.7 vol%. The reflection ratio was compared with the squareness of the hysteresis for the coatings, measured by VSM, indicating the maximum value when plotted as a function of φP. The reflection intensity was strongly influenced by the surface roughness of the magnetic coatings. At a value of φP=45.1 vol%, the particles were well dispersed in the media, with the result that the coating surface became very smooth. The orientation of particles in a magnetic paint was also expressed as a function of the angle between the electric vector of the polarized light and the direction of the applied magnetic field. However, the reflection ratio as a function of another volume fraction, φPL, of the magnetic paints decreased with an increase in the apparent viscosity of the magnetic dispersion.

publication_name.en: Journal of the Magnetics Society of Japan

However, the reflection ratio as a function of another volume fraction, φPL, of the magnetic paints decreased with an increase in the apparent viscosity of the magnetic dispersion.

paper_title.en: MAGNETIC RECORDING CHARACTERISTICS OF DOUBLE-LAYERED LIPS TAPE PREPARED BY OVER-COATING

description.en: In order to obtain the high-density and wide-band recording characteristics of a ''LIPS'' (oriented longitudinally inside and perpendicularly at surface) magnetic tape, improved LIPS structure tapes are fabricated by over-coating and orienting an upper layer on a pre-prepared longitudinally oriented tape. The prepared metal iron LIPS double-layered tapes, upper layer of 1.1-1.4 mu m in thickness/ bottom layer of 1.6 mu m in thickness, show higher output at short wavelengths and almost the same output at long wavelengths as that of the longitudinally oriented mono-layer tape, due to their perpendicularly well-oriented upper layer and longitudinal orientation in the bottom layer.
